summary: Changes the light armor skill tree, making it more useful and based on movement, and stamina regeneration. What makes this mod different is that it doesn’t overhaul any other skill trees. So if you’re like me and always wanted to try better skill trees without changing the entire game, this might be the mod for you.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffffff][font=Calibri][size=3]Changes the light armor skill tree, making it more useful and based on movement, and stamina regeneration. What makes this mod different is that it doesn’t overhaul any other skill trees.
[/size][/font]
[/color][color=#ffffff][font=Calibri][size=3]Hopefully I will get to other skill trees and include themin separate mods, that way, no one has to completely change the entire basis of
Skyrim just for the few good changes that you want, and I’ve already started on the heavy armor tree.  I realize that noperks in the new tree increase armor rating, so heavy armor is now more effective, but weighs more.  Hopefully when I finish the heavy armor tree both will balance out more.  [/size][/font][font=Calibri][size=3]The new light armor skill tree is changed to be focused moreon movement and regenerating / maintaining stamina.

Currently there are two versions of the mod, the 1.1 version changes a couple of the new skills to increase armor rating by request.
[/size][/font]

[font=Calibri][size=3]The new skills include:[/size][/font]
[font=Calibri][size=3] [/size][/font]
[/color][list]
[*][color=#ffffff][size=3]Weightless Defender (3 ranks): Light armor weighs 30/60/90% less and doesn’t slow you down as much when worn.[/size][/color]
[color=#ffffff][size=3] [/size]

[/color][*][color=#ffffff][size=3]Effortless Movement (2 ranks): While wearing alllight armor, reduces falling damage taken by 20/35% and stamina regenerates [/size][/color][color=#ffffff][size=3]30/60% faster.[/size][/color]
[color=#ffffff][size=3] [/size]

[/color][*][color=#ffffff][size=3]Flexibility (2 ranks): Power attacks cost 15/30% less while wearing all light armor.[/size][/color]
[color=#ffffff][size=3] [/size]

[/color][*][color=#ffffff][size=3][color=#f1c232]Version 1.0: [/color]Accustomed Dexterity (2 ranks): While wearing a matching set of light armor you have a 3/6% chance to get a critical hit (with [/size][/color][color=#ffffff][size=3]any weapon).[/size][/color]
[/list][size=3][/size][list]
[*][color=#f1c232][size=3]Version 1.1: [color=#ffffff]Accustomed Dexterity (2 ranks): Increases armor rating by 25/50% and critical hit chance by 2/3% while wearing a full matching set of light armor.[/color][/size][/color]
[/list][size=3]
[/size][list]
[*][color=#ffffff][size=3]Momentum (2 ranks): While wearing a full set of light armor and stamina is above 70%, movement speed is increased by 5% and an [/size][/color][color=#ffffff][size=3]additional 5/10% in while in combat.[/size][/color]
[color=#ffffff][size=3] [/size]

[/color][*][color=#000000][color=#ffffff][size=3][color=#f1c232]Version 1.0:[/color] Deft Movement (2 ranks): While running sideways or forwards incoming damage is reduced by 10/20%. [/size][/color][/color]
[/list][size=3][/size][list]
[*][size=3][color=#f1c232]Version 1.1:[/color] Deft Movement (3 ranks): While running sideways or forwards incoming damage is reduced by 10/20/30%. [/size]
[color=#000000][size=3] [/size][/color][/list][font=Calibri][color=#000000][size=3] [/size][/color][/font]
